channel.title: oop on Anak Wannaphaschaiyong
channel.description: Recent content in oop on Anak Wannaphaschaiyong

item.title: Original OOP is fundamentally different to Modern OOP.
item.description: Modern OOP is misused and misunderstood. Modern OOP create an object to abstract over the object internal state. Originally, OOP is intended to be used to abstract objects over the most important processes that take place within environment in which objects exit. This is done by exposing interfaces that are capable of interacting with the outside worldÂ 1. In the other word, an object should be built to be resurgence, to protect itself from dynamic environment.
